items.name: Saguaro Cactus
items.summary: Iconic symbol of the American West, can live over 200 years and grow 40 feet tall.

items.name: Palo Verde
items.summary: Arizona's state tree with distinctive green bark that photosynthesizes.

items.name: Mesquite
items.summary: Deeply rooted tree producing nutritious pods used by wildlife and humans for millennia.

items.name: Creosote Bush
items.summary: Ancient desert survivor with a distinctive rain-scent, some colonies are over 11,000 years old.
